DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Able give inform consent . 2 . Negative HIV1 serology . 3 . At least 18 55 year age . 4 . Body mass index < 30 . 5 . Estimated creatinine clearance ≥ 50 mL/minute within 30 day prior study entry . 6 . Within 30 day prior study entry : Absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1,000/mm3 . Hemoglobin ≥ 12.5 g/dL male ≥ 11.5 g/dL female . Platelet count ≥ 100,000/mm3 . AST , ALT , total bilirubin within normal range . Alkaline phosphatase < = 1.5 x upper limit normal . 7 . Female study volunteer reproductive potential must negative serum urine pregnancy test perform within 30 day study entry . 8 . Must agree participate conception process . 9 . Drug transporter gene ABCB1 position 3435 genotype C/C T/T . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Use medication metabolize CYP3A UGT1A1 . 2 . Anticipated need take medication metabolize CYP3A UGT1A1 study . 3 . Active drug use dependence . 4 . Inability abstain alcoholcontaining beverage , grapefruit , grapefruit juice . 5 . Serious illness would interfere study participation . 6 . Hospitalization reason therapy serious illness within 14 day prior study entry . 7 . History hypersensitivity study drug formulation . 8 . As determined investigator , significant active previous history cardiovascular , renal , liver , hematologic , neurologic , gastrointestinal , psychiatric , endocrine , immunologic disease ( ) . This inclusive chronic illness hypertension , coronary artery disease , arthritis , diabetes , chronic gastrointestinal condition may affect drug absorption , etc . 9 . Breastfeeding . 10 . Evidence CNS infection space occupy lesion history physical examination . 11 . History significant CNS disorder . 12 . Prisoners subject compulsorily detain . 13 . ABCB1 position 3435 C/T heterozygosity .
